review: The best thing yet, very fast ,picture quality is excellent, got it within 2 days, im considering ordering another one.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It is easy to use and quick to install. It is disappointing that you still have to pay for so many of the shows and movies, even with a Prime Membership. So you pay for the Firestick, and you pay to be a Prime member, and then you have to pay for the shows too. Not really worth it. Should have gone with a different product.
author: Katokat "sleeping through Chaos"

review: Love it was very easy to install and dose everything advertised .

review: Best way to watch TV EVER!

review: Great item for hulu Netflix and other apps great gift for fathers day.

review: This is exactly what I was looking for. I can watch a lot of different things with it.
